column1: #   Arduino IDE -> Tools -> Partition Scheme -> "Minimal SPIFFS" (or any)
#   This file in sketch folder overrides the selected partition scheme automatically
#   1st: ota_0 runs -> writes new firmware to ota_1 -> reboot -> ota_1 runs
#   2nd: ota_1 runs -> writes new firmware to ota_0 -> reboot -> ota_0 runs
